12,000 lbs Adjustable 6" Drop / 6" Rise Three Ball Trailer Towing Hitch 2" & 2-5/16"

Take on any towing challenge with confidence using this powerful and adaptable trailer hitch. Built to handle loads up to 12,000 lbs, it's engineered for serious hauling capabilities.

This three-ball hitch boasts a versatile adjustable feature: a 6" drop or 6" rise allows you to perfectly level your trailer and vehicle for optimal performance and safety in various towing situations.

  • Accommodates both 2" and 2-5/16" ball sizes, providing compatibility with a wide range of trailers.

With its heavy-duty construction and adjustable design, this hitch ensures smooth towing experiences, whether you're hauling a boat, camper, or equipment. Gain the power and versatility you need to tackle any towing project with ease.

View on AliExpress

This heavy-duty trailer hitch is designed to handle demanding towing tasks. It boasts an impressive 12,000 lbs weight capacity, allowing you to confidently tow your heaviest loads. With its adjustable drop and rise capabilities, it offers a versatile solution for various trailers and vehicle heights.

  • 12,000 lbs Weight Capacity: Tow even the most demanding loads with confidence.
  • Adjustable 6" Drop/6" Rise: Customize the hitch height to perfectly match your trailer and vehicle for optimal stability and clearance.
  • Three Ball Design: Accommodates various trailer coupling sizes, including 2" and 2-5/16".

This trailer hitch is constructed with robust materials to withstand the rigors of towing. It features a durable steel frame and powder coating for enhanced corrosion resistance.

The hitch comes equipped with safety chains attachment points and wiring harness connectors for secure towing operations.

This adjustable trailer hitch offers numerous benefits, making it an invaluable asset for serious tow vehicle owners. Its high weight capacity ensures you can handle even the most demanding loads. The adjustable drop/rise feature allows for a customized fit, ensuring optimal stability and clearance.

The three ball design provides versatility, accommodating different trailer coupling sizes. This hitch is built to last, with durable construction and corrosion resistance for reliable performance.

This trailer hitch is ideal for towing a wide range of trailers, including utility trailers, boat trailers, and horse trailers. Its adjustable design makes it suitable for various vehicle types, ensuring a secure and stable tow connection.

Always consult your vehicle owner's manual for specific towing recommendations and ensure the hitch is properly installed and secured before towing.
